articles.description: All the latest football news and Premier League reaction as Liverpool are held at home by Manchester United but go six points clear at the top of the table.
articles.title: Premier League reaction: Liverpool draw thriller with Man Utd to go six points clear

articles.description: MOTD2 pundit Alan Shearer explains why there is no need for Premier League leaders Liverpool to panic after their thrilling draw with Manchester United.
articles.title: Alan Shearer: 'Liverpool were flustered and rattled - but still weren't beaten'

articles.description: A disappointing display in Liverpool's 2-2 draw with Manchester United has prompted questions about whether Trent Alexander-Arnold has been affected by talk about his future, with his contract ending this summer and Real Madrid interested?
articles.title: Trent Alexander-Arnold: 'Real Madrid? More like Tranmere' - has speculation 'affected' Liverpool star?

articles.description: Having shown what they can do in the 2-2 draw at league leaders Liverpool, there can be no more excuses for Ruben Amorim's Manchester United, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Manchester United: Ruben Amorim's side have no more excuses after showing potential at Anfield

articles.description: Detroit earn the NFC top seed, while Tampa Bay and Denver secure the final two play-off spots on the final Sunday of the regular season.
articles.title: NFL results & week 18 recap: Detroit Lions grab top seed, Denver Broncos & Tampa Bay Buccaneers clinch play-off spots

articles.description: Novak Djokovic says he still has "trauma" when he visits Melbourne, three years after being deported because of Covid-19 rules.
articles.title: Australian Open: Novak Djokovic still has 'trauma' over Melbourne Covid deportation

articles.description: Real Madrid boss Carlo Ancelotti says it is "difficult" being Vinicius Jr after the winger was sent off during his side's win against Valencia in La Liga, and hopes the Brazilian will not be banned.
articles.title: Vinicius Jr: Carlo Ancelotti defends Real Madrid winger after sending off against Valencia

articles.description: American superstar Ilona Maher says rugby needs more people "connecting" with the sport after making her debut for Bristol Bears.
articles.title: Ilona Maher: Bristol Bears' new USA star wants to see more superstars in women's rugby

articles.description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola says Jack Grealish must show he 'deserves' to regain his spot in the starting line-up.
articles.title: Manchester City: Jack Grealish must show he 'deserves' starting spot, says Pep Guardiola

articles.description: Hamza Igamane continues his impressive debut season at Rangers with a wonderful hat-trick in the 3-3 draw away to Hibernian.
articles.title: Hibs 3-3 Rangers: 'Box of tricks' Igamane takes 'massive steps forward'
